product_name: belifThe True Cream - Aqua Bomb Hydrating Moisturizer
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsThe best-selling moisturizer is now better than ever - belif's The True Cream Aqua Bomb Hydrating Moisturizer is clinically tested to boost skin hydration level by 231.4%. Think of it as a tall drink of water to dry, dull skin.
details: DetailsKey IngredientsHyaluronic Acid: delivers intense hydration to the skinNiacinamide: helps gently exfoliate dead skin cellsSqualane: helps stabilize the skin's moisture barrier and maintain skin hydrationNapiers Original Formula: an herbal formula that helps the skin feel fresh and hydratedNapiers Aqua Formula: an herbal formula that recharges moisture to the skinResearch Results231.4% instant increase in skin hydration level*Delivers deep hydration to the skin 10 layers deep in just 10 seconds after application**Climate Proof: tested in 4 different climate conditions delivering the same hydration benefits100% agreed that skin was hydrated immediately and visibly replenished the skin***100% agreed that it feels like the skin's hydration level has increased***100% felt that hydration was delivered to the skin***100% agreed that skin appeared plumper due to hydration***Targets: Dryness, Dullness,, Uneven TextureFormulation: Lightweight GelLightweight, fast-absorbing gel moisturizer formulated with two Napiers formulas, Hyaluronic Acid, and Niacinamide to provide a refreshing "drink of water" to dull, dry skin and deliver deep and fast hydration to 10 layers of the skin in just 10 seconds of application**Dermatologically testedSkin Types: Normal, Combination, Dry, Oily*Based on a clinical test**Based on clinical testing of tape stripping skin layers and stripped skin instrumental study***Based on a survey of 30 subjectsFormulated WithoutMineral OilSynthetic FragrancesSynthetic ColorsSynthetic PreservativesItem 2619876How To UseAfter cleansing and toner, apply dime-sized or desired amount to face in a gentle patting motion.Can be used daily, morning and night.IngredientsWater/Eau, Dipropylene Glycol, Glycerin, Methyl Trimethicone, Alcohol Denat., Dimethicone, Cyclopentasiloxane, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Peg/Ppg/Polybutylene Glycol-8/5/3 Glycerin, Pentaerythrityl Tetraethylhexanoate, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Extract*, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract*, Nepeta Cataria Extract*, Rubus Idaeus (Raspberry) Leaf Extract*, Baptisia Tinctoria Root Extract*, Stellaria Media (Chickweed) Extract***, Alchemilla Vulgaris Leaf Extract**, Equisetum Arvense Leaf Extract**, Urtica Dioica (Nettle) Leaf Extract**, Sodium Hyaluronate, Niacinamide, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Panthenol, Peg-150, Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Phenyl Trimethicone, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Carbomer, Tromethamine, Squalane, Peg-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Dimethiconol, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, C14-22 Alcohols, Polysorbate 60, Butylene Glycol, Macadamia Ternifolia Seed Oil, Malachite Extract, Triethylhexanoin, Trisodium Edta, Arachidyl Glucoside, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Sorbitan Isostearate, Glyceryl Stearate, Stearic Acid, Ceramide Np, Cholesterol, Peg-100 Stearate, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Oil***, Citrus Aurantifolia (Lime) Oil ***, Pelargonium Graveolens Flower Oil ***, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil ***, Citral , Citronellol , Limonene, Geraniol, Linalool.*Napiers Original Formula**Napiers Aqua Formula***Fragrances Of Botanical OriginShipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: After cleansing and toner, apply dime-sized or desired amount to face in a gentle patting motion.Can be used daily, morning and night.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product over, and over again.
reviews.comments: I have been a faithful customer of this cream for 2 years now. I love the way it absorbs in my skin and leaves it hydrated and glowy all day.ðŸ˜ŠðŸ˜Š

reviews.headline: From Sample to Believer
reviews.comments: I got a trial size sample in one of the gift sets and fell in love. I bout the Aqua Bomb because it leaves my skin feeling soft and hydrated.

reviews.headline: Instant Hydration
reviews.comments: I have only used it one time and I usually do my skincare routine during the evening, after been using Dermalogica for quite some time and recently realizing that I needed to try out some other products (for price reasons). I came across this online and decide to give it a try. The first night I used the moisturizer my face felt the most hydrated it has in quite some time. The smell isn't bad in my opinion, but I really like the water based texture from this moisturizer. A little goes a long ways as well! My skin is normally combination of oily and dry but some days it has a mind of its own whether one day it wants to be dry and then another day it wants to be oily. I wish it would last all day as I have applied it in the morning before I went to work, but then I also sweat at work all the time. I will definitely be buying this again.

reviews.headline: Great for dry sensitive skin
reviews.comments: I have sensitive dry skin now my skin used to be very oily with aging. My skin has changed. I got this as a gift. I tried it very similar to the Neutrogena Hydro boost smells great. It's moisturizing, but not too thick which I hate thick greasy moisturizer definitely a win.

reviews.headline: Amazing Moisturizer
reviews.comments: This leaves your skin feeling super moisturized but not heavy like some creams can. It smells good and leaves my skin feeling freshly moisturized for a long time. I just wish it was more affordable.

reviews.headline: Lightweight Moisture with Pleasant Scent
reviews.comments: I use this lightweight moisturizer daily after I wash my face. I like how it isn't greasy at all and has a pleasant, light fragrance.

reviews.headline: Yes - I would purchase again!
reviews.comments: Love how this feels on my face! It's refreshing and I personally feel comfortable not putting makeup on afterwards!!

reviews.headline: Great texture, yucky scent
reviews.comments: This moisturizer has a great texture and seeps into the skin well. However, if you are sensitive to smell, this might be too much for you. I cannot get over how it smells like Pledge dust cleaning spray.

reviews.headline: I have the MOST sensitive skin
reviews.comments: I don't even know how much I have spent on skincare because everything makes my skin burn. Until now, I will never not use this, I love it. Super gentle on my skin, even around my eyes. Highly recommended.

reviews.headline: No
reviews.comments: I had heard good things about this moisturizer.  Wanted to give it a try.  I think its better for younger skin because its very light weight and not moisturizing enough for mature skin

reviews.headline: My derm doc approved this!
reviews.comments: I love this. I apply after LaRoche Posay Hyalu B5. I find that it keeps my skin hydrated and soft all day WITHOUT FEELING TACKY OR HEAVY!!!  I took it to my yearly body scan at the dermatologist and she looked it over, typed a few things in her computer and said "Yes! This is good!" I was relieved since I had already grown to like it and did not want to switch. The price is good and I am a rewards member so if you are reading this and you think the price seems high, maybe use some of your Ulta Rewards points to help offset the cost. I'm to the point where I have tried so many things for my menopause-era skin and I buy what works w/o worrying too much about the cost.

reviews.headline: They added Squalene and now I breakout
reviews.comments: This used to work for me but not anymore.  I was breaking out for the first time in forever and was using this.  I checked the ingredients and it now has squalene in it-that always breaks me out.  So into thd garbage.  It used fo be great.

reviews.headline: I got this as a free sample and LOVE it!
reviews.comments: I'm so glad I tried out this free sample when I got it.  It instantly makes your face feel moisturized.  I've tried a lot of products and I'm over 60 now.  I have never felt like my face was so smooth and refreshed after using a product, but this one is the bomb!  I love it so much, I ordered the moisturizer also to see how that works.  This is more of a serum that hydrates.

reviews.headline: Love this
reviews.comments: Great product

reviews.headline: Belif me when I tell you this is the Bomb!
reviews.comments: I rarely do reviews and only when I really feel I can recommend a product.  I've been using belif True Cream- Aqua Bomb Hydrating Moisturizer since Fall of 2024 and have enjoyed it since day one.  It has a very nice gel-like consistency,  a light botanical fragrance, absorbs quickly, and provides a nice base for makeup that doesn't pill.  I'm in my late 50s so dryness is more of a concern but still get the occasional blemish. I also have sensitive skin and this moisturizer is very safe and gentle to my skin. It feels so refreshing when I put it on in the morning and in the evening after washing my face.  It's the part of my skin care routine that I look forward to the most!

reviews.headline: Formula Changed
reviews.comments:
Used to be the only thing i could use without breaking me out but with the new formula the added ingredients already have broke me out-_-
Go back to old formula PLS PLS PLS

reviews.headline: So moisturizing!
reviews.comments: Love the gel feel

reviews.headline: Splash of Hydration
reviews.comments: I go back to this moisturizer time and time again, due to the fact that it is the most beautiful texture & delivers consistent results. Water-gel texture, no harsh fragrances, makes skin instantly feel smoother and also looks great under makeup. I recommend this constantly for my dehydrated friends!

reviews.headline: Unfortunate
reviews.comments: I got this product as a sample and fell in love almost immediately. It's not greasy like most lotions and creams and it absorbs quickly. However, it's not labeled as cruelty free which is a big no from me. I googled it to find they do sell to mainland China, where animal testing is still required. So even though Belif doesn't test on animals themselves, they sell to countries that do. Unfortunate and disappointing, but no thanks!

reviews.headline: This is my top moisturizer
reviews.comments: I absolutely love this product,     it makes my skin very smooth

media.headline: This was a no for me
media.caption: Aqua Bomb

faceoff_positive.comments: I really liked this moisturizer. It has a light clean fragrance, and it left my skin feeling super soft and hydrated. It feels extremely familiar to me, and it dawned on me why. I have a jar of of Neutregena HydraBoost gel, so I set them side by side with eachother. It's nearly identical. Even the fresh clean fragrance is very similar. Both of these moisturizers perform EXACTLY the same. The only slight difference that I noticed between the two, was Belif Tru Cream Aqua Bomb did make me break out a tad. Nothing major, but I did get a couple tiny whiteheads around my T- Zone. Neutregena has never given me that problem, and has been my go to moisturizer, because it doesn't break me out. I would still use the Belif, it preformed exactly the same as the HydraBoost, and the little breakout was nothing to be alarmed about, and it definitely wouldn't detour me from using the product. I love both! I will use both. This is good to know, in case the retailer doesn't have one or the other, now I have a substitute for each one. Could possibly be a dupe also. I received the Belif True Cream Aqua Bomb from BzzAgent for free, in exchange for my honest opinion, so I don't know the price up front.
faceoff_positive.headline: Familiar

faceoff_negative.comments:
I started using this product on my face in the evening and in the mornings. After the first day, I did notice some skin irritation, minor breakout, but it did not continue and resolved, I think my skin was getting used to the product. Loved the feel, definitely made my skin feel sheer and moisturized. I also really liked the packaging surprisingly, the lid of the container had a lip that made it easier to open, small detail but definitely noticed! 

Unfortunately, the product has an off-putting scent, very reminiscent of a lemon scented cleaner ( think pine sol ). It was also awful if I happened to get it on my lips, very very chemical-y taste. I started sucking my lip in when I applied and avoided that issue. But I just couldn't get past the smell. Overall, the product does what it is supposed to, definitely moisturizes, doesn't linger, soaks in well and no greasiness or residue. If the scent does not bother you then this could be a great product to try.
faceoff_negative.headline: Great feel, cant get past the smell

rollup.name: The True Cream - Aqua Bomb Hydrating Moisturizer
